mapper.insert: insert into LF_Product_Test (category, title, lost_found_date, writer, lost, content, feature, photourl) values (#{category}, #{title}, #{lost_found_date}, #{writer}, #{lost}, #{content}, #{feature}, #{photourl})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM LF_Product_Test WHERE lost=1 LIMIT #{startList}, #{listSize}
SELECT * FROM LF_Product_Test WHERE lost=0 LIMIT #{startList}, #{listSize}
